component.name: Ultramarine Linux
component.summary: The open-source operating system that just works, anywhere

description.p: Ultramarine Linux is a Fedora-based Linux distribution designed to stay out of your way and be easy to use. All editions come with several tweaks preapplied to make initial setup and daily usage seamless.

This is the current version for Rawhide, which is a continuous rolling development branch. No releases are ever made directly from Rawhide, and it never freezes. There is no guarantee of stability. Rawhide is intended for initial testing of the very latest code under active development.
Ultramarine Linux 42 upgrades are out now! Don't forget your towel!
